Events.RelatedDescription: Closed issue "Error opening document template with CustomUI in OpenXML SDK 2.0" (#1138) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
**Description**

### Received error while opening document template (.docm) containing  CustomUI part in OpenXML SDK 2.0

**Information**

- .NET Framework 
- DocumentFormat.OpenXml Version: 2.0.5022

Specified argument was out of the range of valid values.   Parameter name: relationshipType
 at DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.WordprocessingDocument.CreatePartCore(String relationshipType)
at DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPartContainer.CreateOpenXmlPart(String relationshipType)
at DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPartContainer.LoadReferencedPartsAndRelationships(![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33087518/159866816-271309ae-a330-44cf-b21f-f56ebddc8c15.png) openXmlPackage, OpenXmlPart sourcePart, PackageRelationshipCollection relationshipCollection, Dictionary`2 loadedParts)
at DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.OpenXmlPackage.Load()
at DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Packaging.WordprocessingDocument.Open(String path, Boolean isEditable, OpenSettings openSettings)

Could you please help to resolve issue ? 


![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33087518/159867798-c723c98e-462c-40b6-bd51-28405acc8a81.png)

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33087518/159868466-26d23da7-9000-4ecf-9a72-ca9ee2de1516.png)
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/33087518/159868506-94d80a34-c104-41b8-9f57-aa0050ccbd15.png)

Closed issue "OpenXML nuget package x64 release build error" (#1148) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody:
am using OpenXML nuget package (v2.10.0) for my UWP project

though **"x64 Debug build" is OK**

I am getting **build error** during **"x64 Release Build"** with OpenXML nuget package

Is their any solution for this problem?
```
....PATH....\microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\Microsoft.NetNative.targets(805,5): error : Type 'System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions' from assembly 'System.Xml.XPath.XmlDocument' was not included in compilation, but was referenced in method 'HtmlWeb.GetCacheHeader(Uri, string, string)'. There may have been a missing assembly, or a dependency on a more recent Windows SDK release. [  ....PATH.... ]
          ....PATH....\microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\Microsoft.NetNative.targets(805,5): error : Type 'System.Xml.XmlDocumentXPathExtensions' from assembly 'System.Xml.XPath.XmlDocument' was not included in compilation, but was referenced in method 'HtmlWeb.GetCacheHeader(Uri, string, string)'. There may have been a missing assembly, or a dependency on a more recent Windows SDK release. [  ....PATH....]
          ....PATH....\microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\Microsoft.NetNative.targets(805,5): error : Method 'HtmlWeb.GetCacheHeader(Uri, string, string)' will always throw an exception due to the missing method 'XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectSingleNode(XmlNode, string)' in assembly 'System.Xml.XPath.XmlDocument'. There may have been a missing assembly, or a dependency on a more recent Windows SDK release. [  ....PATH....]
          ....PATH....\microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\Microsoft.NetNative.targets(805,5): error : Method 'HtmlWeb.GetCacheHeader(Uri, string, string)' will always throw an exception due to the missing method 'XmlDocumentXPathExtensions.SelectSingleNode(XmlNode, string)' in assembly 'System.Xml.XPath.XmlDocument'. There may have been a missing assembly, or a dependency on a more recent Windows SDK release. [ ....PATH.... ]
          ....PATH....\microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\Microsoft.NetNative.targets(805,5): error : ILT0005: ' ....PATH....\runtime.win10-x64.microsoft.net.native.compiler\2.2.10-rel-29722-00\tools\x64\ilc\Tools\nutc_driver.exe
```

Events.RelatedDescription: Merged pull request "Remove resolver from namespace constructor" (#1165) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Remove resolver from namespace constructor" (#1165) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Opened pull request "Separate framework from typed classes" (#1164) at OfficeDev/Open-XML-SDK
Events.RelatedBody: This is an initial change to move the infrastructure of the SDK to a separate assembly. This is done in a way that will not break the current set up by defining type forwards from `DocumentFormat.OpenXml` to the new `DocumentFormat.OpenXml.Framework` assembly. This is a WIP and updates will be pushed to the PR as progress is made. The change is expected to be made before 2.18.0 and is a precursor to any changes to separate out by document type (word/excel/powerpoint).
